languages.text: "Избирай тактику мудро. Не каждый день тебе советует столь опытный воин, избранный самим Всеотцом нести смерть врагам Человечества".
"Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Избирай тактику мудро. Не каждый день тебе советует столь опытный воин, избранный самим Всеотцом нести смерть врагам Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather Himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."
"Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather Himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

"Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

languages.text: “明智地选择战略吧，你并不是总会有机会听取经验丰富战士的建议。这位战士由全父亲手挑选，会为人类之敌带来死亡。”
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “明智地选择战略吧，你并不是总会有机会听取经验丰富战士的建议。这位战士由全父亲手挑选，会为人类之敌带来死亡。”

languages.text: « Réfléchissez bien avant de choisir votre stratégie. Ce n'est pas tous les jours que l'on peut profiter des conseils d'un guerrier aguerri, choisi par le Père de Tous Lui-même pour massacrer les ennemis de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Réfléchissez bien avant de choisir votre stratégie. Ce n'est pas tous les jours que l'on peut profiter des conseils d'un guerrier aguerri, choisi par le Père de Tous Lui-même pour massacrer les ennemis de l'humanité. »

languages.text: 「戦略はよく考えて選べ。人類の敵に死をもたらすために、全知の父によって選ばれた熟練の戦士の助言を聞ける機会は滅多にないぞ」
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「戦略はよく考えて選べ。人類の敵に死をもたらすために、全知の父によって選ばれた熟練の戦士の助言を聞ける機会は滅多にないぞ」

languages.text: «Elija bien su estrategia. No todos los días se puede contar con el consejo de un guerrero curtido al que eligió el Padre de todas las cosas personalmente para aniquilar a los enemigos de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Elija bien su estrategia. No todos los días se puede contar con el consejo de un guerrero curtido al que eligió el Padre de todas las cosas personalmente para aniquilar a los enemigos de la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Wählt Eure Strategie weise. Ihr bekommt nicht jeden Tag die Gelegenheit, dem Rat eines erfahrenen Kriegers zu folgen. Eines Kriegers, der vom Allvater selbst auserwählt wurde, um den Feinden der Menschheit den Tod zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Wählt Eure Strategie weise. Ihr bekommt nicht jeden Tag die Gelegenheit, dem Rat eines erfahrenen Kriegers zu folgen. Eines Kriegers, der vom Allvater selbst auserwählt wurde, um den Feinden der Menschheit den Tod zu bringen."

languages.text: "Stratejini dikkatli seç. Zira İnsanlığın düşmanlarını katletmesi için Yücebaba'nın bizzat kendisi tarafından seçilen, görmüş geçirmiş bir savaşçıdan tavsiye almak herkese nasip olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Choose your strategy wisely. It's not every day you get to heed the advice of a seasoned warrior, one chosen by the Allfather himself to bring death to the foes of Humanity."
